products.title: Vitra Blackout Deep Plum Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout deep plum fabric is a chic very dark blue/ purple shade, it's sleek and stylish and will work beautifully within the home or office. Pair with different purple shades or cool grey tones to create a striking look within your home. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Deep Plum 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This deep plum blackout vertical blind adds a bold shade to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new dark purple blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this purple vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.
